title: How to Become President in BitLife: Everything You Need To Know

steps.title: Purchase Bitizenship.
steps.content: Purchase Bitizenship. Bitizenship is BitLife's premium subscription. While BitLife is a free game, some features are locked behind purchasing Bitizenshipâ€”including becoming President. Bitizenship is a $4.99 one-time purchase.

steps.title: Create a character.
steps.content: Create a character. Make sure you start in the United States. Try to start with a character with high looks and smarts, as this will make the journey easier.

steps.title: Play the game until your character enters university.
steps.content: Play the game until your character enters university. Work on maintaining your looks and smarts during this time, and try to save money. You can ask for money from your parents or get a part-time job to start saving.

steps.title: Enroll in Political Science at university.
steps.content: Enroll in Political Science at university. Continue to work and keep up your grades, and make sure not to get in trouble with the law. Any past mistakes may come up when your character is trying to run for President. After finishing a Political Science degree, go to Business or Law school to help land more lucrative careers to save up for your future political campaigns. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Join social media.
steps.content: Join social media. This will help kick-start your character's popularity. Make sure to post on social media often to increase the chance that you'll go viral and gain a lot of followers.

steps.title: Work until your character is at least 35.
steps.content: Work until your character is at least 35. Getting a job as a lawyer will get you started on your political career path and will also help generate a lot of money.

steps.title: Get involved politically as soon as possible.
steps.content: Get involved politically as soon as possible. You can start by running for the School Board or for Mayor. Maintain a high approval rating once you manage to get a political office secured. Politicians can allocate time per week for different platforms. Allocate 9 hours to each platform to maintain a high approval rating.

steps.title: Continue to climb the political ladder.
steps.content: Continue to climb the political ladder. After a few terms as Mayor, run for Governor. Make sure you maintain a high approval rating while continuing to generate money. The more money you have, the better your chances of having a successful campaign.

steps.title: Run for President once you've got at least $80 million.
steps.content: Run for President once you've got at least $80 million. You will need to set a campaign budget when you run for President. Some users say that having closer to $200 million gives you a better chance, but you should be able to run a decent campaign with $80 million. If you want to learn how to make a lot of money in BitLife, read this wikiHow to get ideas! Pay special attention to the questions asked of you when running for President, as these answers matter. If you had a good campaign, your character will be elected President. If you don't get elected, you might be able to try again if your character isn't very old, but you may want to start over fresh as well.
